name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.200.10
- Fixed bug where Slifer was channeling even when you Summoned with a max stack of Summons
- More balancing adjustments
- Predaplant Tokens now have proper art
- Fixed Pumprincess and Pot of Duality artwork
- Machine Conversion Factory now Evokes your orbs (when upgraded)
- Glitch orbs & Time Wizard action adjustments
- Added 4 new starting deck options
- You can now remove cards from starting decks via the other mod options (ie changing the card set size will filter those removed cards out of the starting decks too)
- Added a few new special cards that only appear in the new starting decks



Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
Email: nyoxidestsmods@gmail.com
Discord: Nyoxide#3464
